detailsData.title: Legal Expertise
detailsData.content: I help my clients build the solid legal foundation they need to maximize and grow the value of their business, with a focus on their intellectual property portfolios and marketing activities. My services are tailored to my clients’ business, industry, and strategic goals.

detailsData.title: Creative Collaboration
detailsData.content: My practice is grounded in creative collaboration, thought leadership, and fierce client and industry advocacy. This ensures that my clients receive innovative and effective legal solutions.

detailsData.title: Entrepreneurial Insight
detailsData.content: Having started two of my own law firms, I know first hand about the risks and rewards of being an entrepreneur. This experience allows me to provide practical and strategic legal counsel.

detailsData.title: Industry Leadership
detailsData.content: I co-founded the International Cannabis Bar Association and the Bay Area Women Grow Chapter. These roles demonstrate my commitment to advancing legal standards and supporting industry growth.

valueProp: I help my clients build the solid legal foundation they need to maximize and grow the value of their business, with a focus on their intellectual property portfolios and marketing activities. My services are tailored to my clients’ business, industry, and strategic goals.
CTA: I’D LOVE TO BE YOUR STRATEGIC LEGAL PARTNER

testimonalData.text: Amanda's legal expertise helped us navigate complex IP issues with ease.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Her strategic advice was invaluable in growing our business.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: Amanda is a creative and practical lawyer who truly understands entrepreneurs.
testimonalData.author: Emily Johnson
